ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR(
RecordTypeId="012700000001jeX", RecordTypeId="012700000001kKx", RecordTypeId="0120g000000l3qD", RecordTypeId="0120g000000grzo"), Client_Push__c = TRUE, ISBLANK ( Updated_First_Check_Date__c ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Original check date must be populated if Client Push is checked.
